title: 考试前最后的垂死挣扎之一，vb代码，百分之六十都是vb，lz最后的倔强
author: 玫兰蒂斯
txt_content:
本帖最后由 玫兰蒂斯 于 2020-7-24 08:46 编辑 

Private Sub Command1_Click()
s = 0
t = 1
For i = 1 To 5
    t = t * i
    s = s + t
Next i
Print s
End Sub

Private Sub Command2_Click()
s = 0
For i = 1 To 100 Step 2
s = s + i * i
Next i
Print s
End Sub

Private Sub Command3_Click()
For i = 100 To 999
a = i Mod 10
b = i \ 10 Mod 10
c = i \ 100
If i = a ^ 3 + b ^ 3 + c ^ 3 Then Print
Next i
End Sub

Private Sub Command4_Click()
Dim cock, hen, chick
For cock = 1 To 20
For hen = 1 To 33
chick = 100 - cock - hen
If cock * 5 + hen * 3 + chick \ 3 = 100 Then
Print "cock="; cock, "hen="; hen, "chick="; chick
End If
Next cock
Next hen
End Sub
阶级求和一百以内的奇数平方和还有百元买鸡法和水仙花数代码
遇到困难，死记硬背
遇到困难，睡大觉（划去）
